metadata.title: CVE-2020-6807 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When a device was changed while a stream was about to be destroyed, thestream-reinit task may have been executed after the stream wasdestroyed, causing a use-after-free and a potentially exploitable crash.This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 68.6, Firefox < 74, Firefox

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
